participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, Jordan loves working on projects and values quality time with friends.
participant_1.background: My most difficult decision was to leave my family behind when I moved away to college. I don't like to eat meat. I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I own a dog who is my best friend. I play the drums.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing her love for teaching and arts with others.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with my friend, who is a native Spanish speaker. I am a sixth grade teacher. I do not eat well. I am an artist from a small town in the midwest. I like watching sports.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
How's your day going?
It's going great! I just got back from teaching my 6th grade class.
Oh that's awesome! I'm a teacher too!
Really? What grade do you teach?
I teach 11th grade science.
That's cool! I'm an artist from a small town in the midwest.
Oh wow! That's amazing! I've always wanted to paint.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun!
I will! I think I'll start with watercolors.
That's a great idea! Watercolors are really easy to use.
Awesome! Thanks for the advice!
No problem! What are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm going to go home and build a birdhouse with my dog.
That sounds like fun! I love building things.
Me too! It's really relaxing.
I know what you mean! It's a great way to de-stress.
Exactly!
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
